ISSUE.TITLE: Sitemap not showing up in Footer
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.50 Expected Behavior: Sitemap should be displayed in the footer when the appropriate settings are enabled. Actual Behavior: After respectively disabling and enabling the setting Sitemap enabled, Sitemap doesn't show up. Debugging shows the checked value of Sitemap enabled is not passed to the controller. Steps: 1. Admin Panel -> Configuration -> Settings -> General Settings 2. Uncheck Sitemap enabled on the Sitemap section if it's checked 3. Save 4. Public Store -> Footer -> No Sitemap item under information column, as expected. 5. Return to Admin Panel -> Configuration -> Settings -> General Settings 6. Ensure Display "Sitemap" on the Footer items section is checked 7. Check Sitemap enabled on the Sitemap section 8. Public Store -> Footer -> No Sitemap item under information column [A.M. comment] Looks like the "Sitemap enabled" setting is not properly saved Source: https://www.nopcommerce.com/en/boards/topic/93456/sitemap-not-showing-up-in-footer-nop-version-45
